articles.description: The Allegheny County health department is working on an order to prevent alcohol from being consumed inside bars and restaurants by Tuesday at 5 p. m. , due to the county's recent spike in COVID-19 cases, according to a release. "For the first time since COVI…

articles.author: 8NewsNow staff
articles.title: 736 new cases of COVID-19 reported in Clark County, SNHD attributes ‘more than 300’ to June 25 report - KLAS - 8 News Now
articles.description: LAS VEGAS (KLAS) — Saturday’s large number of cases reported in Clark County can once again be attributed to a delay in laboratory reporting. The Southern Nevada Health District is reporting 736 new cases, although the case count “includes more than 300 cases…
